Description of incident: Nationwide Mortgage notified customers of a data breach when copies of their W2's were inadvertently emailed to an employee at Greenlight Mortgage. The information compromised included names, addresses, Social Security numbers and other information that is common with a W2 form. The company is providing one year free of Experian's ProtectMyID Elite. Those who are affected can call 877-441-6943 or www.protectmyid.com/enroll.More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-57381
